channel.title: Just a noob needing help making a first script
channel.description: i really need help making a script... i really have no idea what im doing i seen a tutorial by drigger :) but that didn't help me 1 bit. i seen the stuff he put in there but it just didn't get to me it didn't stick. idk what to do if any1 can post a link to a good tutorial that i could understand better that would be great... but right now i just really wanna make a script. thanks to any1 that is helpfull :D

item.title: Just a noob needing help making a first script
item.dc:creator: @Adelmas Adelmas
item.description:
@Adelmas wrote:

I used the same tut, and IT"S VERY HELPFUL.

Take your time to read what he’s saying.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a noob needing help making a first script
